analysis.description:
SafeMath.dateBonus (/unique_chucks/1/0x662abcad0b7f345ab7ffb1b1fbb9df7894f18e66.sol#71-88) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- daysFromStart == 1
	- daysFromStart == 2
	- daysFromStart == 3
	- daysFromStart == 4
	- daysFromStart == 5
	- daysFromStart == 6

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/1/0x662abcad0b7f345ab7ffb1b1fbb9df7894f18e66.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.11 (/unique_chucks/1/0x662abcad0b7f345ab7ffb1b1fbb9df7894f18e66.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_owner' of StandardToken.balanceOf (/unique_chucks/1/0x662abcad0b7f345ab7ffb1b1fbb9df7894f18e66.sol#164-165) is not in mixedCase
